item.description:
Once again spontaneity combines with lack of planning to produce an AMAZING MID-WEEK OPPORTUNITY!

So, I'm going to hit Metro-Rock tonight, and I invite you all to join me. If you haven't been before, you'll need to pass a belay test before they let you climb, or you can take one of their classes if you're an absolute beginner.

I'll try to hang around the table for a few minutes at 7pm, otherwise I'll be climbing or bouldering. I'll be wearing an old, faded dark blue t-shirt with a breast pocket.

See you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I shaved my head, so I look a lot like my meetup picture now!
item.name: Last-minute Madness!
